# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice of Project Procurement (NPP) for Software and Preventative Maintenance Services

Software and Preventative Maintenance, and Remedial Services for C-Cure 9000 (Stand-alone Access Control System) for Canadian Grain Commission – Winnipeg

## Goods or Services Procured (biens ou services procurés)
The Canadian Grain Commission requires a security integrator to provide preventative and remedial maintenance services for the existing Stand Alone C-Cure 9000 Access Control System (ACS) and to support migration to a remote access platform.

## Performance Requirements (exigences de performance)
Deliverables include:
*   A written maintenance plan within the first six months of contract award
*   A written quarterly maintenance record for all tasks and services completed
*   Maintenance of all upgrades, updates and repairs within one month of identifying an issue or from each software update release
*   An itemized list of all ACS equipment that comprises the Canadian Grain Commission’s ACS and provide as-built drawings by conclusion of the first year of the contract
